original_text: Your enemies are all around and they are ready to attack you. So get all your things together. Prepare to leave your country. Your enemies are all around
korean_text: 에워싸인 가운데에 앉은 자여 네 짐 꾸러미를 이 땅에서 꾸리라

sentences.original_text: and they are ready to attack you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 당신을 공격할 준비가 되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So get all your things together
